name: ACCOUNT_TYPE
comment: This entity is used to maintain the account type (BAN type) and account subtype (BAN subtype) definitions, including indications for special accounts.

column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) are), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: ACC_TYPE
column.comment: Account type

column.name: ACC_SUB_TYPE
column.comment: Subset of the account type

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: NAME_FORMAT
column.comment:
Indicates whether the name is a fielded or personal name (P), a
double-lined business name (D), or another format (O). This indication
is needed for editing and searching purposes.

column.name: INITIAL_CREDIT_CLASS
column.comment:
Default external credit class. (if CREDIT_REQUIRED_IND = "N", use
initial_credit_class)

column.name: EU_DEF_CREDIT_LIMIT
column.comment: The default credit limit amount, in EUR.

column.name: CAS_CREDIT_REQ_IND
column.comment: Indicates if credit evaluation is required.

column.name: RISK_CHECK_REQ_IND
column.comment: Indicates if risk check is required.

column.name: FORCE_ZERO_BAL_IND
column.comment:
Indicates if the balance is initialised after the billing process, according
to type.

column.name: BILL_PROD_IND
column.comment:
Indicates if a bill is produced for the type of account (for example: no
bill for ECA).

column.name: BALANCE_HANDLE_IND
column.comment: Indicates if the balance is maintained for an account of this type.

column.name: VAT_EXEMPTION
column.comment:
The indicator indicates whether the BAN is tax exempted. Valid
values: "Y" - there is an exemption, "N" - there is no exemption

column.name: PRINT_CATEGORY
column.comment: This field indicates the print status of the bill.

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.comment: Description

column.name: DEFAULT_BILL_FREQUENCY
column.comment: Set the default bill frequency.

column.name: DEF_FIRST_MONTH
column.comment: Set the default first month

column.name: CARRY_OVER_IND
column.comment:
Indicates whether the balance of this bill may be added to the next bill
without an additional charge for late payment. Carry over is usually
applied when the amount to be paid is less than the minimum payable
amount according to the market policy. Valid values: N - No, Y - Yes.

column.name: MAX_CONSECUTIVE_MONTHS
column.comment:
The maximum number of consecutive months during which the
customer is allowed to have a carry over bill.

column.name: EU_MIN_BILL_CHRG_AMT
column.comment:
The minimum bill charge amount. A bill balance less then this amount
will be carried over to the next month, in EUR.

column.name: DEF_BILL_FORMAT
column.comment: Default bill format.

column.name: DEF_MEDIA_CTGR
column.comment: Default media category.

column.name: DEF_PAYMENT_METHOD
column.comment:
The default payment method according to the Account type and
subtype

column.name: ADDR_VALIDATION_IND
column.comment:
Indicator whether an address validation is required for this category of
account / sub-account.

column.name: OVER_LIMIT_THRESHOLD
column.comment:
Number of subscribers that represent the threshold for deposit
calculation of 'over limit' and 'under limit',

column.name: DISPUTE_EXP_MONTHS
column.comment:
Indicates the number of months after which a dispute will become an
adjustment for the account.

column.name: AUTO_OVER_PAY_REFUND
column.comment:
Indicates whether the account should be refunded automatically, when
in overpayment.

column.name: SKELETON_CONTRACT_LEVEL
column.comment: R - Required O - Optional F - Forbidden

column.name: DEF_MAILING_OPTION
column.comment: Default mailing option. Value from Mailing Options table

column.name: GROSS_DISCOUNT_IND
column.comment:
Indicates whether the discounts are shown on the bill as gross
amounts.

column.name: DEF_INSURANCE_LIMIT
column.comment:
The default insurance class for a new BAN of this account /
subaccount type, measured in number of subscribers.

column.name: MAX_NUM_SUBSCRIBERS
column.comment:
The default maximum number of the subscribers per billing account
(will be used for service provider BAN's).

column.name: PPD_ELIGIBLE_IND
column.comment:
Indicates whether a prepaid option can be defined for a BAN with this
account type & sub type.

column.name: EU_GENERAL_ADJ_AMT
column.comment:
This is the EUR total amount of general adjustments that can be
granted to an account in a pre-defined period, in EUR.

column.name: GENERAL_ADJ_PRIOD
column.comment:
This is the pre-defined period in which a limited amount of general
adjustments can be granted to an account

column.name: DISPUTE_AUT_ACTION
column.comment:
The action to be performed on the dispute action date, if the dispute is
still open. A - approve, R - reject

column.name: DISPUTE_ACTION_DAYS
column.comment:
This represents the number of days that should be added to the
dispute creation date, in order to calculate the dispute action date.

column.name: EU_MAX_DEPOSIT_AMT
column.comment:
This attribute defines the maximum deposit EUR amount that can be
requested for an account, in EUR.

column.name: DEF_APPL_METHOD_1
column.comment:
This is the default which defines the payment application method to be
used when a non-designated credit is received in the account. A - by
amount T - by amount and tolerance S - by sum amount B - Balance
forward

column.name: DEF_APPL_METHOD_2
column.comment:
This is the default which defines the payment application method to be
used when a non-designated credit is received in the account. A - by
amount T - by amount and tolerance S - by sum amount B - Balance
forward

column.name: DEF_APPL_METHOD_3
column.comment:
This is the default which defines the payment application method to be
used when a non-designated credit is received in the account. A - by
amount T - by amount and tolerance S - by sum amount B - Balance
forward

column.name: DEF_APPL_METHOD_4
column.comment:
This is the default which defines the payment application method to be
used when a non-designated credit is received in the account. A - by
amount T - by amount and tolerance S - by sum amount B - Balance
forward

column.name: EU_DEF_APP_TOLERAN
column.comment:
This attribute is used by the cash application function. This is the EUR
amount used as a tolerance amount when trying to locate an invoice
according to its amount, EUR.

column.name: EU_DEF_APP_CLR_TOL
column.comment:
This attribute is used by the cash application function. When an
invoice is selected for payment application, and the difference
between the EUR payment amount and the invoice EUR amount is
less than this attribute amount, the difference will be adjusted, in EUR.

column.name: BAN_LINK_RELEVANCY
column.comment: Indicates if an account of this type can participate in a BAN link.

column.name: EU_RLS_MAX_DEP_AMT
column.comment:
The maximum deposit amount that can be automatically released, in
Euro.

column.name: EU_CLEAR_TRSLD_AMT
column.comment:
This threshold amount is used in cases when, after a payment is
applied to the account, an invoice remains open with a very small
amount, or a very small unapplied cash amount remains. If the
remaining amount is less than this threshold, the amount is adjusted.
This amount is in Euro.

column.name: CYCLE_POPULATION_CD
column.comment: The types of BANs that can be in the cycle.

column.name: CREDIT_EVAL_ALG
column.comment:
Impacts the selection of the Over Limit algorithm S- Use the algorithm,
which compares to Market Limit (Private and Small businesses). B- Do
not check against Market Limit (Business & Authorities)

column.name: WORST_CRDCLS
column.comment: Worst Credit Class allowed in Over Limit algorithm.

column.name: WORST_CNT_DURATION
column.comment:
Minimum Contract duration, in days of account for Over Limit
algorithm.

column.name: CONDITION_TYPE
column.comment:
Defines activities / actions which are allowed / performed in certain
conditions.

column.name: REACT_ALOWED
column.comment:
Criteria for reactivation offer eligibility. 'Y' - indiviual and small
business eligible for reactivation offer.

column.name: ACC_PRIMARY_TYPE
column.comment: This field contains the account primary type.

column.name: DEF_PAM_LIMIT
column.comment: !!! BITTE NACHPFLEGEN !!!

column.name: D2PC_ALLOWED_IND
column.comment: Indicator if D2PC is allowed

column.name: SUB_PROLONG_PERIOD
column.comment:
The contract prolongation period when subscriber purchase a
subsidized handset.

column.name: BSCT_ALLOWED
column.comment:
Indicates if it is allowed to define BSCT for a root BAN with this
account type

column.name: SK_DISPUTE_AUT_ACTION
column.comment:
The action to be performed on the dispute action date, if the dispute is
still open. A - approve, R - reject.

column.name: SK_DISPUTE_ACTION_DAYS
column.comment:
This represents the number of days that should be added to the
dispute creation date, in order to calculate the dispute action date.

column.name: PRINT_SET_NO
column.comment: Print set number contains values in the range of 01 to 99.

column.name: HEADER_CODE
column.comment: Header code.

column.name: LETTER_CUST_CODE
column.comment: Points to LETTER_CUST_CODE in LETTER_CUST

column.name: NO_OF_SUBSCRIBERS
column.comment: Number of Subcribers

column.name: BT_DON_BAR
column.comment: Account_type/Subtype to donate money (Balance Transfer).

column.name: PA_HIDDEN
column.comment: hidden package amount
